archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0071
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, if my plan has been cancelled, I want to be prompted to purchase a new one, so that I can use my Vodafone subsription again

properties.value: Is this one about a plan becomes out of service for all customers or a case when a Consumer cancels his plan? It's the second. A customer is moved to no plan option.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
